original: split. - intros H. unfold is_RInt_gen in H. apply filterlim_locally in H. intros eps Heps. specialize (H eps Heps). unfold filter_prod, at_point in H. simpl in H. destruct (is_RInt f a b l) eqn:Ha. + apply Ha. + exfalso. apply H. intros. apply is_RInt_point. - intros H. unfold is_RInt_gen. apply filterlim_locally. intros eps Heps. unfold filter_prod, at_point. exists (is_RInt_point _ _ a a), (is_RInt_point _ _ b b). intros x Hx; subst; apply H.
